pullRequest.title: Issue #8019: resolve FileTabCharacter violations in test resources
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolves #8019
Out of the 105 violating files, 58 have been fixed and the rest suppressed. Some suppressions are inevitable as they are required for testing. The others have been suppressed because fixing them leads to build failures. However, these can be fixed with some tweaking and these fixes will follow in subsequent PRs by me, once this is merged.

nodes.bodyText: Please trim path to just [\\/]test[\\/]resources[\\/] and checkname (indentation, suppresswithplaintext...) with the input on the end.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -74,4 +74,78 @@
   <suppress checks="RegexpSingleline"
     files="[\\/]InputJavadocTagContinuationIndentationGuavaFalsePositive\.java"/>
 
+  <!-- intentional problem for testing -->
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputJavadocWithCrAsNewline\.javadoc"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputLeadingAsterisksExtended\.javadoc"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputListWithUnclosedItemInUnclosedParagraph\.javadoc"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputMixedCaseOfHtmlTags\.javadoc"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputUnclosedParagraphFollowedByJavadocTag\.javadoc"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputFileTabCharacter\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputMainGenerateXpathSuppressionsTabWidth\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputXpathQueryGeneratorTabWidth\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputFileTabCharacterSimple\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputIndentationUseTabs\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="[\\/]InputCheckerTabCharacter\.txt"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="src[\\/]test[\\/]resources[\\/]com[\\/]puppycrawl[\\/]tools[\\/]checkstyle[\\/]checks[\\/]indentation[\\/]indentation[\\/]Input.*\.java"/>
+  <suppress checks="FileTabCharacter"
+    files="src[\\/]test[\\/]resources[\\/]com[\\/]puppycrawl[\\/]tools[\\/]checkstyle[\\/]filters[\\/]suppresswithplaintextcommentfilter[\\/]Input.*"/>
